org.shared.stat.plot

Interface PlotContext<T extends PlotContext<T,P>,P extends Plot<P>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the parameterization lower bounded by PlotContext itself.
    P - the Plot type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GnuplotContext

    public interface PlotContext<T extends PlotContext<T,P>,P extends Plot<P>>
    Defines a context for creating Plots.
